scripts.predocker:clear:dev: rm -rf docker-compose.yml || true && cat docker/dev/docker-compose.yml >> docker-compose.yml
scripts.docker:clear:dev: docker-compose down && docker image prune -a -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.predocker:up:dev: rm -rf docker-compose.yml || true && cat docker/dev/docker-compose.yml >> docker-compose.yml
